Will Ubuntu run pretty smoothly on 199MB: depends on your configuration.  I've run Linux variants with under 64MB of RAM, if I use a lightweight desktop environment instead of GNOME or KDE.
I'd recommend against the default install, that will take forever on an archaic machine.

is it a laptop?  If so grab an external CDROM, if it's a desktop, just grab a spare.  (I keep hundreds of spare CDROMS drives around, mainly because I never know when I'll need crappy parts for some project.)
